## Mission

The HealthSonar device was developed by a versatile and experienced group of experts, both from academia and industry.
Each one is a leader in their area of expertise and they bring at the table an opportunity of mutual growth in order to develop the HealthSonar system and 
advance science and technology through cooperation and open practices.
